div.head: 經脈不勻
div.div: irregular passage through the conduit vessels

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: irregular passage through the conduit vessels

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yue shui bu tiao 月水不調 , menstrual irregularity. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry dan shen 丹參：止血崩帶下，調婦人經脈不勻 , “It ends blood collapse with discharge from below the belt, and regulates irregular passage through the conduit vessels of women”.
